downloadTitle: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) and Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) Samples for .NET Framework 4
downloadDescription: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) and Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) for .NET Framework 4
detailsSection: Easy to understand samples to quickly ramp up on the Windows Communication Foundations and the Windows Workflow Foundation in .NET Framework 4. For details about each of the samples, please see the documentation
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right-hand corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save or Save this program to disk.

relatedResourcesSection.title: wcf and WF Samples for .NET Framework 4 (Visual Basic version)
